main.name: Achmad Ismail Rivaldi
main.description: Hi! My name is Achmad Ismail Rivaldi. I just graduated as a Bachelor's Degree of Computer Sciences at IPB University.
main.bio: My name is Achmad Ismail Rivaldi. I just graduated as a Bachelor's Degree of Computer Sciences at IPB University. I have experience since 2017 as Android developer and frontend since I did various project during college. My skills are Flutter, PHP, Laravel, MySQL, and good at communication and teamwork. Always eager to learn new things from anyone.
main.contactmessage: Write your message here to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Since my college, I have learned about Big Data, Artifical Intelligence, Information System, Software Engineering, etc. And between all of them, I'm interested as a Developer. I've done my research about develop an android application on my script, namely RPPI Mart.
On senior high school, I joined a Japanese language club and I'm interested in its culture. I also participated in a teenage scientific club.
During my junior high school, I follow badminton and multimedia extracurricular activities. I was once had experience as a tutor in multimedia extracurriculars
My journey was started here. I started to like things about technology

work.title: Android Developer
work.description: Do some research and build android apps (RPPI Mart) for customers to order products or goods at RPPI Cooperative.

work.title: Web Developer Internship
work.description: Worked as web developer internship on system called Nobu e-Pav dashboard such as creates new modules, optimizes home and landing pages, and improves the user interface.

work.title: Web developer
work.description: Build information system for manages livestock data, monitoring income and outcome, and feed availibility for livestock on Faculty of Animal Science at IPB University
